TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IQueryAmbient

summary.span: 查询是否应将指定的属性视为当前范围中的环境属性。

span.span: Queries for whether a specified property should be treated as ambient in the current scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 环境属性机制的用途是通过告知 XAML 对象编写器，以避免实例化某些对象，在其中已知的对象为典型的运行时是临时的且不是有用的值的情况下提高分析的时间应用程序。The purpose of an ambient property mechanism is to improve parsing time by informing a XAML object writer to avoid instantiating certain objects, in cases where it is known that the objects are for values that are temporary and not useful for a typical run time application. 通常情况下，XAML 查找或属性 get 访问器的 XAML 处理需要实例化此类对象来填充对象图表示形式与准备就绪，可以使用值。Normally, XAML lookups or XAML processing of a property get accessor would need to instantiate such objects to fill the object graph representation with ready-to-use values. 包含一个成员： 。 has one member: . 是为并行机制。 is a parallel mechanism to . 是专用的机制，可避免使用反射来确定信息，并且还可以包含 act 函数 (给定的对象无法选择报表`true`或`false`为)，而该属性是实质上是静态分析）。 is the specialized mechanism that avoids using reflection to determine information, and can also act situationally (a given object could choose to report `true` or `false` for ), whereas the attribute is essentially static analysis). 是，可以使用由 XAML 对象编写器，并且通常关联到专用的 XAML 类型系统属性的常规机制和。 is the general mechanism that can be used by XAML object writers and that typically correlates to the dedicated XAML type system properties and . ## WPF 实现 IQueryAmbientWPF Implementations of IQueryAmbient 在 WPF 中，用于资源字典查找过程。In WPF, is used for the resource dictionary lookup process. 查找进程获取连续`Resources`整个 WPF 逻辑树的值，致力于资源作用域的根之前密钥找不到或确定键在作用域中不存在。The lookup process gets successive `Resources` values throughout the WPF logical tree, working towards the root of the resource scope until either a key is found or the key is determined to not exist in scope. 通常，此操作需要实例化每次接收结果。Normally, doing so would require instantiating a each time to receive the results. 声明的内容`Resources`只要为环境`Resources`存在来优化此查找过程。Declaring the contents of `Resources` as ambient so long as `Resources` exists optimizes this lookup process. 在 WPF 中，系统会在以下情况下实现此接口：In WPF, this interface is implemented in the following cases: - 实现返回`true`对所有的属性名，如果它包含的现有为，并且只要查询不是针对属性本身。 implements to return `true` for all property names if it contains an existing for , and so long as the query is not for the property itself. - 实现的相同模式其。 implements the same pattern for its . - 实现的相同模式其。 implements the same pattern for its . - 实现的相同模式其。 implements the same pattern for its . - 实现的相同模式其。 implements the same pattern for its . 它还报告内容与环境，但是返回`false`如果查询本身。It also reports content as ambient but returns `false` if querying for itself. - 在这些情况下，相关的每个`Resources`属性 (和) 特性化为。In each of these cases, the relevant `Resources` property (and ) are attributed as . 典型用法就是对查询不是属性特性化的定义的接口的对象的属性。The typical usage is to query for the properties that are NOT the attributed properties of the object that defines the interface. 换而言之，处理程序，但前提是为了创建对象图时提供的潜在的运行的时间值存在的资源字典，除了资源字典属性容器以外的任何其他属性可视为环境。In other words, so long as a resource dictionary exists in order to provide the potential run time value when the object graph is created, any other property besides the resource dictionary's property container can be treated as ambient.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsAmbientPropertyAvailable(string propertyName) cil managed
Public Function IsAmbientPropertyAvailable (propertyName As String) As Boolean

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 要检查其环境状态的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property to check for ambience state.

summary.span: 查询可否将指定的命名属性视为当前范围中的环境属性。

span.span: Queries for whether a specified named property can be considered ambient in the current scope.

returns.span: 如果所请求的属性可视为环境属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the requested property can be considered ambient; otherwise, .
